mapper.insert: insert into hz_experiment_note (resource_id, student_id, course_id, test_id, title, content, create_time, last_update_time) values (#{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update hz_experiment_note set student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_id = #{testId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select resource_id, student_id, course_id, test_id, title, content, create_time, last_update_time from hz_experiment_note where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select resource_id, student_id, course_id, test_id, title, content, create_time, last_update_time from hz_experiment_note
